Name: Improved Holland Gin Cocktail
Ingredients: 1.25 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. [To measure 1.25ml and how many dashes in 1.25ml, please see Measuring cocktail ingredients .]
Review: Salmon-pink with subtle juniper, rounded by maraschino liqueur, aromatic bitters and absinthe.
History: The classic Holland House "improved" due to the use of genever.
Nutrition: One serving of Improved Holland Gin Cocktail contains 108 calories
